dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers,Inc. on behalf of Crutchfield Corporation (www.
dmca.body:
_____  

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Enforcement Team
Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2006 12:59 PM
To: support@bigondigital.com; sales@bigondigital.com; info@bigondigital.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers,Inc. on behalf of Crutchfield
Corporation (www.bigondigital.com)




  _____  

 

1/26/06

 

Re: Violation of Crutchfield New Media Copyright

 

 

Dear Sir/Madam:

 

            It has come to our attention that you are using copyrighted text
and/or images from our web site, Crutchfield.com.  We have reviewed your
site (www.bigondigital.com) and have made copies that show your verbatim
copying of large portions of our web site including, but not limited to, 

 

http://www.bigondigital.com/display.php?MainCat=Entertainment
<http://www.bigondigital.com/display.php?MainCat=Entertainment&SubCat=Person
al+Audio&SubLevelCat=&ItemView=true&Brand=Sony>
&SubCat=Personal+Audio&SubLevelCat=&ItemView=true&Brand=Sony

 

https://bigondigital.com/display.php?MainCat=Entertainment
<https://bigondigital.com/display.php?MainCat=Entertainment&SubCat=Personal+
Audio&SubLevelCat=&ItemView=true&Brand=Sony>
&SubCat=Personal+Audio&SubLevelCat=&ItemView=true&Brand=Sony

 

            As a web site owner that has copyrighted its own web site, I am
convinced that (www.bigondigital.com) is aware of how concerned we are by
this use of our copyrighted work.  Each and every page of our web site has a
clearly marked copyright notice.  We are hereby placing
(www.bigondigital.com) on notice that this work is a valuable asset of
Crutchfield New Media and that we intend to vigorously enforce our
copyrights.  Crutchfield New Media has spent vast sums of money in creating
this site and has no intention of allowing our intellectual property to be
used in violation of state and federal copyright laws.

 

            I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named [Crutchfield New Media, LLC] ("IP
Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed
herein are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and
therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or
United States law. We are hereby requesting that you discontinue the use of
all Crutchfield New Media copyrighted material immediately.  If the
offending material is not removed we will have no choice but to pursue
appropriate legal action against you.  

 

Note that we are sending a copy of this letter to your internet service
provider, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. to place them on legal
notice that you are violating our intellectual property rights and that by
allowing this material to remain posted it is contributing to the
infringement of our rights under federal and state laws.   

 

            If you have any questions on this matter you may contact me at
1-434-817-1000, extension 2452.

 

 

Sincerely,

 

 

Ronald Solomon

In House Counsel

Crutchfield Corporation
